index.title: AMP music your musical instrument importer

custom.banner_title: Modified by you, made by Fender
custom.banner_desc: Create a factory-customized guitar, as unique as you are.
custom.step1_desc: Select your model and choose all specifications.
custom.step2_desc: Review specifications and place an order. You will receive a confirmation email.
custom.step3_desc: Your instrument is manufactured in our Corona, California plant and goes through Fender's inspection process.
custom.step4_desc: We build and ship your order within 30 days.
custom.carousel: Choose one of our available models.

sobre_nosotros.title: Our history
sobre_nosotros.desc: For more than ten years we have imported original Fender instruments, becoming leaders in the Argentine market. We have stores in the north area, offering variety, specialized advice and guaranteed quality. Thanks to our experience, today we are sales leaders in the region.
sobre_nosotros.contact_title: Leave us your email with your request
